subject: Nutrition
title: How Color Affects Appetite
description: One-minute skill: How Color Affects Appetite.

hook.text: Fast food chains use red and yellow because those colors increase hunger. Blue suppresses appetite.

buildup.text: Red stimulates urgency and excitement. Yellow triggers happiness. Together they signal 'eat and enjoy.'

discovery.text: People eat 25% less food on blue plates compared to red or white ones in controlled studies.

twist.text: When researchers dyed steak blue, diners felt sick even though the taste was identical to normal steak.

climax.text: We trust our eyes more than our tongues. Visual cues override flavor in shaping the eating experience.

punchline.text: You eat with your eyes first, and they're easy to fool.
